# Ejercicio 1

```{r, echo=TRUE}
A <- rbind(c(1,3), c(2,4))
A%*%(A+A)%*%A
```

# Ejercicio 2

```{r, echo=TRUE}
B <- rbind(c(2,4,-6), c(0,0,3), c(0,-2,5))
eigen(B)$values
```

&nbsp;&nbsp;

# Ejercicio 3

```{r, echo=TRUE}
C <- rbind(c(-48,35,-12), c(-134,95,-32), c(-194,133,-44))
round(eigen(C)$vectors[,1], digits = 3)
round(eigen(C)$vectors[,2], digits = 3)
round(eigen(C)$vectors[,3], digits = 3)
```

# Ejercicio 4

```{r, echo=TRUE}
D <- rbind(c(-2,-8,-2,3), c(-3,-6,-1,2), c(-9,-22,-3,7), c(-18,-44,-8,15))
qr(D)$rank
```
